name: AI driver
description:
Interesting proyect to view how Artificial Intelligence learn to drive.

You can compete versus him too.

How to play:

  • First of all, press "Auto Learn" button 
  • When score is more than one, you can save the learned score to continue other day.
  • Navigate with free cam using mouse drag and "QWASDE" buttons.
  • Drive a car at any moment pressing "space"
  • View how the bestAI drive in the track pressing "View Best" button.
  • Compete versus the best AI pressing "Compete" button.
  • Press "Esc" button to leave the program in any moment.

The IA consist in a SVM with 9 inputs, 5 neurons on first layer, 3 neurons at second layer and 2 outputs. Its trained with genetic algorithm where every genoma is array of 66 float values from -1.5 to 1.5
